fields.name: Classic Beaker Ice Bong With UFO Perc
fields.description: This classic bong features a classic beaker base for stability, ice notches, a larger water reservoir for filtration and a UFO percolator for increased cooling! The Classic Beaker Ice Bong With UFO Perc is aclassically styled beaker bong from our own EDIT UK Collection is made from 4mm thick borosilicate glass and features our awesome new UFO percolator. The piece is equipped with ice notches, a 14.5mm female ground joint, removable diffuser downstem and matching male bowl slide.

fields.name: Roor UK - 7.0 3 Piece Bong
fields.description: Introducing the Roor UK  7.0 Green heavy-duty Bong! The Roor UK bong with the thickest wall diameter of all the pieces in our collection. 7mm wall thickness means 40% more glass volume compared to the models with 5mm, a fact that results in an unmatched grade of stability. This bong consists of a cylinder, a down tube and a separate lift-off bowl. All Roor glass bongs come complete with a Roor glass gauze. Now With Bistable Joint! This Roor piece now comes with a bistable joint as standard, this adds 40% more glass to the ground notch adding more stability and making it less prone to breakage.

fields.name: RoB Hurricane DTI 250 Symbol - Clear - Fire Water
fields.description: The clear Hurricane DTI 250 Symbol - The smoothest rip you'll ever take! That is how our testers described the Hurricane bongs from RoB with their patented cyclone technology when they got their hands on them. No more irritation when you take a massive pull of some super dank chronic, no more dirty ashtray taste, just clean smooth clouds that will leave you wanting another hit straight away. This is a world class bong, have no doubt. The Clear Symbol version is made of clear glass but has additional artwork on it, in this case, their Fire Water symbol. The way the system works is that the smoke is firstly pulled up into and through each of the orb shaped chambers which gives it a chance to cool gradually as it rises. The smoke is then acted on by 6 Hurricane Jet Nozzles (two in each of the three chambers) which act to spin the air inside each of the chambers. This causes even the smallest of water droplets to clump together and get forced onto the glass by the centrifugal force and leaves only the cleanest and purest smoke to continue it's journey upwards. In addition to all of that they also include a dry ashcatcher which attaches to the top of your downstem and allows you to stop a large percentage of the particles before they even get to the bong itself. There are several other key features which seperate the Hurricanes from the vast majority of bongs and they all simply come down to thinking about the way we use them and then trying to make it simpler. Firstly the carb hole is right on the front of the bong, meaning that you can use it while reclining and there is never going to be any spillage. Then there are three sturdy glass feet which mean it is going to always stand straight and true. They have even thought about making it easier for people with lip piercings by making the mouthpiece a shape which allows the piercing to no interfere with the seal around the edge. These hand made German masterpieces are made of the finest 100% borosilicate Schott Duran glass and come with 35 years worth of experience moulded into each one. Each Hurricane DTI 250 comes complete with two downstems (one for use with the ashcatcher and one for use without) along with a bowl to complete the set and a numbered authenticity card.

fields.name: Stemless Beaker Ice Rig With Jug Handle
fields.description: This stemless beaker ice bong from our own EDIT Collection is made from 4mm thick borosilicate glass. Equipped with an inline showerhead percolator, this frosted glass piece also features a female 14.5mm removable bowl, ice notches, and an inventive jug-style handle. Inline Showerhead Percolator, 4mm Glass Thickness, Removable Bowl Slide, Ice Notches, Jug handle For Ease Of Use, Exclusive to the EDIT Collection

fields.name: Rasta Beaker Bong with 8-Arm Tree Perc
fields.description: Flow are known for creating stuff that is a little different and this beaker bong is definitely not your average water pipe. It's base is coated in orange apart from a small ring around the bottom. The bong joint is a massive 29.2mm which means that the 18.8mm downstem joint doesn't have to reduce it's inner daimeter to fit and so you get almost no restriction. After passing through the diffuser slots in the bottom of the downstem the smoke has to climb it's way through the 8-Arm Tree perc which has further diffuser slots at the end of each tre branch. Above this there are three rounded ice notches which mean you can go for the glacier feeling if you want to be even more chilled. The neck is coated in green to contrast nicely with the orange base and perc accents. They also include an 18.8mm male bowl to fit the downstem.

fields.name: Starship Bong by Snoop Dogg POUNDS | 6 inch
fields.description: Part of the brand new POUNDS collection from Snoop Dogg, the Starship is ready to blast the competition away! A beaker shaped 6" water bong made for herbs, it is the perfect addition to your collection as a more portable bong for group settings or even personal use as a beginners piece. We are so proud to bring our UK users the new Snoop Dogg POUNDS range of bongs! Let the Starship transport you past the clouds and sky high!

fields.name: 8.75" Helix Beaker Water Pipe
fields.description: The Helix Water Pipes are designed for maximum capacity in the smallest possible space. They have a super wide base section and a tapered top section which means plenty of space for you to milk it up and then rip it clear for a massive hit. In between the two sections is the iconic Helix Flute which will chill and clean your smoke to perfection. The removable diffused downstem is fitted with a 14.5mm female joint.

fields.name: Roor Bong 5mm 3 Piece
fields.description: The 'Bong 5.0 Black' with a height of 35cm has a wall thickness of 5mm and an outer diameter of 45mm. Stability, functionality, aesthetics; these are the main criteria for a good water-pipe. High quality raw material, professional processing and, naturally, the thickness of the pipe wall together with the pipe diameter are the prerequisites for stability. This bong consists of a cylinder, a down tube and a separate lift-off bowl. All Roor glass bongs come complete with a Roor glass gauze. Now With Bistable Joint! This Roor piece now comes with a bistable joint as standard, this adds 40% more glass to the ground notch adding more stability and making it less prone to breakage.

fields.name: Bong 2-Piece Recliner 18.8
fields.description: This good looking bong's aesthetic appeal lies in its utter simplicity. No added-on gimmicks or crazy colours to try to sell it, just one old-fashioned damn good bong. It has a reclining shaft which allows for easy and comfortable use, an 18.8 sized joint for a nice big bowl and a carb-hole situated on the left side (from behind). The glass is superbly finished and the shaft features the subtle Art Glass logo in a classy white shade. Expertly crafted, beautiful looking, fantastically smoking and an amazing bargain to boot, this is truly magnificent value.

fields.name: Bent Neck Double Honeycomb Perc Rig
fields.description: Coming from our very own EDIT UK Collection, this bent neck double honeycomb perc rig features double honeycomb percolators. Equipped with a female 18.5mm ground joint, this glass piece includes a male to male adapter, glass concentrate nail, and a female vapour dome.

fields.name: Stemless Button Diffuser Cross Perc Bong | EDIT Collection
fields.description: This stemless, double-chamber multi-percolator waterpipe is from our own exclusive and high quality EDIT UK Collection. It is equipped with a female 14.5mm joint, and made from 100% borosilicate piece, it also features a 14.5mm male slide bowl.

fields.name: Spaceship Puck Rig by Snoop Dogg | 6 inch
fields.description: POUNDS has brought out a new piece of glassware to help you get that extraterrestrial high! The Spaceship is a smaller brother to the Battleship, both made for concentrates but the Spaceship being the more portable of the two. Standing at 6" it's small but strong, ready for concentrate connoisseurs and new dabbers alike!

fields.name: Waterpipe Gift Kit
fields.description: If you like to enjoy your herbs through a water pipe, giving you filtered and cooled hits, then this is the bundle for you! We have put together this fantastic kit for those who love their hits filtered through water, and for those which haven't tried it yet! This gives you everything you need to have the best smoking experience, all you need to do is grab your herb and we have sorted the rest! With this bundle you will get: 1 x EDIT Collection Water Pipe, 1 x 100ml Limpuro Bio Bong Cleaner, 1 x 4-Part Grinder, 1 x Pipe Cleaning Brush, 1 x Smell-Proof Baggie

fields.name: Chongz - Swiss Tony Perc Glass Bong
fields.description: Here we have a super-sized glass bong from the budget glass manufacturers Chongz. Standing at an immense 47cms tall, this colossal glass bong comes designed with a percolator maze. This perc design forces the smoke to filter through the water and increase in surface area. The result of this action is a smooth and clean hit for the user. Chongz then complete this colossal glass bong with a female 18.8mm joint size, male 14.5mm bowl and finally ice notches for those wanting an extra fresh hit. Finally, the glass piece is then nicely complemented with black coloured accents on the base and bowl joint.

fields.name: EHLE Glass 5mm Ice Cylinder Bong
fields.description: This 5mm thick Ice Cylinder bong combines elegant design with high quality materials to get the perfect smoking performance. The 5mm thick glass is high-grade borosilicate and the EHLE logo is sandblasted, while the round foot is a as solid and sturdy a base as you will find. Ice notches allow the addition of ice cubes to further enhance your smoking experience. The pinpoint precision joints of EHLE glass water pipes are made on their own factory premises and are subject to continuous quality and performance tests. They guarantee the utmost accuracy in the fitting of all parts and accessories. After running through computer-controlled cool and temper processes, every glass piece is sure to be delivered totally stress-free.

fields.name: 12" Flared Water Pipe with fixed downstem
fields.description: The 12 inch Flared Water Pipe from Grav Labs is a great piece that is simple yet incredibly well engineered to provide awesome function. The straight tube design is complemented by an ice pinch just below the mid point so you can throw a few ice cubes in if you want to bring it down another few degrees. The fixed downstem is fitted with a multi-slit diffuser at the end to make sure that your smoke is fully broken up and given all the filtration you could want. The joint is a 14.5mm female ground glass one and the bong itself comes with a 14.5mm male bowl to fit.

fields.name: EHLE Clear Cylinder Bong Hexagon Foot 1000ml
fields.description: This lung-worryingly 1000ml capacity EHLE Clear Cylinder bong (no ice notches) packs one heck of a powerful punch, with a vibrant, robust and straight-line design. Its everyday suitability makes it your devoted friend in all smoking conditions from big parties to quiet nights home alone. EHLE Glass Bongs are manufactured using only high-grade borosilicate glass. Their pinpoint precision joints are made on their own factory premises and are subject to continuous quality and performance tests. They guarantee the utmost accuracy in the fitting of all parts and accessories. After running through computer-controlled cool and temper processes, every glass piece is sure to be delivered totally stress-free.

fields.name: EHLE 500 Custom Straight Tube Bong
fields.description: From the German glass masters comes these 5 limited edition straight bongs. There's only going to be 500 of these made worldwide and we have the 1st 200, each of which has been numbered on the base making your bong completely unique! Using high-quality borosilicate glass each bong has been blown to EHLE's supreme standards. The 500 ml capacity makes these great all-rounders for both newbies and connoisseurs to enjoy. At 54mm in diameter, it has a comfortable width when sat within your hands and the straight neck and lack of ice notches give a tidy, clean profile to the bong.  There are 5 awesome EHLE designs to choose from with both 14.5 and 18.8mm joint sizes available in the drop-down menu.

fields.name: Lil Lazzy Inline Glass Bong with 2 percs
fields.description: The Weed Star Lil Lazzy Inline is the little sister to the Big Lazzy. This is a compact, 4mm thick, fashionable inline glass bong that lies down when resting. The major components of this water pipe is the optical colour inspiration with swirls of black and white on the two dome percolators, inline percolator as well as the large 14.5mm glass bowl. There is a clear glass arm protruding from the top of the bong which acts as a stand for the water pipe to lay horizontal. Moving down from the mouthpiece there are three standard ice notches just above the dome percolators. With three percolators this piece treats the smoke three times before reaching the mouthpiece providing a cooling, treated, optimal smoke.

fields.name: Black Leaf - Silly Skin Flask Bong with Silicone Skin
fields.description: These simple beaker bong designs from Black Leaf have neon colored silicone sleeves around the neck and around the base to add some uniqueness and to help give a little better grip on the most important areas of the bong. There is one wrap of silicone around the base which adds stability and stops it sliding around on smooth surfaces, then there is another around the neck of the bong to give you some more grip when you want to pick it up. The silicone wraps themselves have been 'swiss-cheesed' so that you can still see through them and check out how milked up it is before you open the side mounted carb hole and clear it like a boss. The removable downstem has a 14.4mm female ground glass joint and they include a 14.4mm male bowl with roll stops to finish it off.

fields.name: Bent Neck Double Honeycomb Perc Rig
fields.description: Coming from our very own EDIT UK Collection, this bent neck double honeycomb perc rig features double honeycomb percolators. Equipped with a female 18.5mm ground joint, this glass piece includes a male to male adapter, glass concentrate nail, and a female vapour dome.

fields.name: Orbital Stemless Perc Bubbler
fields.description: This stunning Orbital handheld perc bubbler by EDIT Collection includes a sturdy ball-footed base.  Featuring an inline slit disc percolator, this glass piece comes complete with a male 14.5mm joint and bowl slide.

fields.name: Dab Rig With Inline Perc And Triple Honeycomb Perc
fields.description: This stunning and functional dab rig from our very own EDIT UK Collection is made from top quality borosilicate glass for strength and durability. Featuring a slitted inline perc and three honeycomb percs for amazing levels of cooling, this piece comes complete with a quartz glass concentrate nail, vapour dome, and ice notches. This piece offers one of the smoothest, and coolest dab experiences that money can buy!

fields.name: Eyce Silicone Dab Rig
fields.description: The Eyce Silicone Dab Rig is a must have for anyone who wants to be able to take their rig on the go without worrying about dropping and breaking a glass piece. The tough medical grade silicone can withstand pretty much anything you can throw at it and more. It comes as a full kit, complete with GR2 Titanium nail, dab tool and built in silicone storage compartment for your dabs. With the built in diffuser at the base of it's down stem you get perfect filtration and cooling, giving you thick, smooth, milky dabs time after time.

fields.name: Bumblebee Honey Bubbler Oil Rig | Lion Glass
fields.description: Here we have a beautiful honey decorated oil rig by Lion Glass. Recent newcomers to the glassblowing industry, Lion Glass and it's founder Scott Ratner are based in Colorado and are known for their abstract glass designs. To be used with oil and wax concentrates, this lovely oil rig comes decorated with honey drops covering the mouthpiece, base and vapor dome. The glass piece is then sublimely complemented with a black and yellow bumblebee on the glass chamber. This stunning glass oil rig comes equipped with a male 10mm joint size and a female 10mm vapor dome. This quirky glass oil rig would fit perfectly into the collection of any dabbing enthusiasts who prefer the more unique glass items.

fields.name: Showerhead Perc Beaker Oil Rig | Liquid Sci Glass
fields.description: Liquid Sci Glass bring you these stunning beaker base oil rigs with showerhead percs. Finished with different logo designs, they feature everything you want to give you great hits each time. The beaker base design makes it sturdy as well as enabling it to hold more water for better filtration. It has a fixed male diffuser which helps break up, filter and smooth your smoke. It also has a showerhead perc to further filter and cool your smoke as it travels up the pipe. Above the showerhead percolator is a splash guard, ensuring you get no foul tasting water enter your mouth when you're using it. Above the splash guard sits three ice notches, allowing you to stack up some ice if you want even further cooling to your smoke. With stunning detailing on them, these functional rigs perform just as good as they look. Available in a choice of designs, please see drop down for options. Included: 1 x Showerhead Perc Beaker Oil Rig, 1 x Female 18.8mm Nail

fields.name: 7.5 Inch Fountain Perc Oil Rig
fields.description: This dab rig gives you everything you want and need from a dab rig in a compact size, making it perfect to take out with you. Its small size at just 7.5" in height makes it super portable but also perfect for people who are new to dabbing. It has a fountain percolator to help cool and filter the smoke, as well as a bent mouthpiece to prevent and water reaching your mouth. It has a rounded base making it secure and sturdy and comes in a choice of either beaker or rounded body. Finished with black accents, this dainty little dab rig looks awesome! It comes fitted with a male 14.5mm joint size, a female 14.5mm vapor dome and a 14.5mm nail.

fields.name: Highscore Convertible Straight Tube Bong
fields.description: The Highscore Convertible Straight Tube Bong is no one-trick pony. With a slide bowl and a concentrate nail, it’s ready for anything right out of the box. Dry herb? Done. Dab time? Let’s do it. Clean colored glass makes up the neck of the bong, and the base and perc are color coordinated as well. Two perfectly paired percolators make for silky smooth hits every time.

fields.name: Puffco Peak
fields.description: The Puffco Peak gives you the cleanest flavours and strongest effects when vaping concentrates. The Peak has four heat settings represented by the LED light band: the blue light is 450°F, green 500°F, red 550°F and white is 600°F. The average heat up time for the Peak is an impressive twenty seconds. It also has fast charge feature and will be fully charged from empty in two hours. A new feature on the Peak is the the Sesh function which allows you to extend your session creating a social dab experience. The smartware in the Peak automatically adjust heat times if your bowl is still hot, providing a more consistent experience during repeated use or when the Sesh function is used. The haptic feedback tells you when the Peak has reached your desired temperature.

fields.name: Blaze Glass Concentrate Rig
fields.description: Whether you are into oil, wax or other concentrates this is the perfect glass tube for you. Made from premium quality borosilicate glass, or pyrex to you and me, this perfectly formed glass dab rig is durable, heat resistant and sure to hit the spot. This oil rig comes complete with an integrated showerhead perc and a stainless steel dab nail with glass dome, so you're ready to start dabbing straight away.

fields.name: Higher Standards heavy duty dab rig
fields.description: This beautifully clean design comes from Higher Standards, USA. This heavy duty rig has been handcrafted from medical grade borosilicate glass to meet the higher standards of connoisseurs. The thick circular base and 45° angled neck allow the user to comfortably use this from a tabletop, leaving your hands free to heat, dab and stir. The rig comes with a quartz male banger included which fits perfectly into the upright downstem providing an airtight airflow. The vapor is then diffused into the body of the rig in a pleasing flow of cooled bubbles. This diffusing not only makes it smoother and more comfortable on your lungs, but also enables you to create some supreme looking clouds. All parts of the rig are easily accessible so you'll be able to keep it looking just as fresh as when it arrives. To keep it looking it's best it's recommended to use Higher Standards ISO Pure and Salt Rox, alongside their other well presented maintenance products. Each rig comes presented in a stylish case which used for safe storage and transportation. This is an ideal gift for anyone who only looks for the very best in taste and design.

fields.name: Stemless Recycler Rig
fields.description: This Stemless Recycler Rig from the EDIT UK Collection is sure to have you doing dream dabs in no time. With an included glass nail and vapor dome, you’re ready to go right away. The stemless design features a matrix perc and a recycler chamber for supreme smoke filtration. Made from scientific borosilicate glass, so you know it won’t give up easily.

fields.name: Dr Dabber Boost Black Edition
fields.description: Dr. Dabber has taken the popular Boost and made it even better. The Boost Black Edition now comes with 3 nails which are 50% larger than before so you can create some huge clouds! The 3 nails included are quartz, titanium and ceramic allowing to customize it to your taste and heat preferences. All the nails supplied are domeless which can be filled, stirred and capped off using the smart stainless steel magnetic carb cap and tool, without having to switch hands. The heating element can heat the nails to impressively high heats in as little as 25 seconds (Ceramic/Quartz 600°F, Titanium 610°F) and is fully replaceable so there's no need to replace the whole unit if anything happens. The glass water attachment has an inline diffuser which break the vapor down into a wider surface area in lots of tiny bubbles which rise to the surface of the water before being inhaled through the flared mouthpiece. Included is a magnetic stand which holds the unit perfectly upright when in use to prevent stressing the glass. Everything comes presented in a protective hinged casing lined with dimpled foam. This unit covered by a one year ‘No Questions Asked’ warranty on electronic components & battery.

fields.name: Blaze Glass Mini Donut Inline Oil Bong - Straight
fields.description: This beautiful glass bong from Blaze Glass is made from the finest quality borosilicate glass for heat resistance and durability.  The piece stands a diminutive 18.5cm in height, but don't let size fool you - this little beauty packs a real punch. The Blaze Glass Mini Donut Inline Oil Bong comes equipped with a borosilicate glass concentrate nail and a custom made vapour dome with an easy to use handle, so you are set up for oils and concentrates straight away. Smoke is drawn from the nail and dome, down through the chunky inline diffuser, where it is broken up into finer particles which cools the smoke and smoothes it out.  It then travels round the extended smokepath created by the donut hole, bound for the mouthpiece. This great quality oil rig is decorated with either a rasta or clear design on the reinforced downstem and finished with the iconic Blaze Glass logo in bold, black print.

fields.name: Oil Drum Dab Rig
fields.description: This Oil Drum Dab Rig from our very own EDIT Collection is a funky and functional piece of glass work. The cylindrical shape mirrors the look of a real life oil barrel, and is available in different glass colors. The 14mm male ground joint is topped off with a 14mm female vapor dome with a quartz concentrate nail, and the frosted EDIT logo finishes the piece.

fields.name: Grace Glass Super Saxo Bong - Limited Edition
fields.description: We here at EDIT love Grace Glass, their innovative approach to refreshing old school designs never leaves us anything short of amazed. The Super Saxo Bong just serves to highlight the vision and sheer quality Grace Glass exudes. This gorgeous piece has a different approach to adding percolators to the system. The modular design of this waterpipe allows the owner the choice of adding a whole extra chamber to the mouthpieces ground joint. The supplied Keck-Clips ensure that the joints are securely held together providing strength and ensuring a tight seal at the ground joints. Each of the bongs chambers houses a colour coded showerhead perc and are constructed entirely from 4mm borosilicate glass making sure that your smoke is filtered and cooled effectively and efficiently before reaching the 35mm flared mouthpiece providing a superior smoking experience. Also featured are an 18.8mm female ground joint, a male 18.8mm adapter, 18.8mm bowl slide and an 18.8mm vapour dome and glass nail. This beautifully quirky design will surely become a jewel in the crown of your glass collection with it's stunning form factor and unrivalled performance providing you with years of faithful service.

fields.name: Showerhead Diffuser Bubbler with Swing Banger
fields.description: This portable clear glass showerhead diffuser bubbler from the EDIT UK Collection is available in a variety of coloured accents. This sturdy glass dab rig comes equipped with an effective showerhead diffuser, sidecar mouthpiece, and quartz swing banger.

fields.name: The Anthony Dab Rig
fields.description: The Anthony from the Cheech and Chong Up In Smoke range is a sweet little rig that will keep you totally lifted man. It's pretty compact at just 8.5 inches tall and the double tier showerhead perc will cool and clean your smoke giving you super tasty milky hits that will have you chilled for hours.

fields.name: Mini Bell Bubbler
fields.description: The Mini Bell Bubbler from the EDIT Collection is an ideal addition to any glass collection. Small and sturdy at the same time, this little guy delivers quite the hit. Colored glass accents on the joint and mouthpiece match perfectly, and the included quartz banger ensures full functionality right out of the box. 14mm Female Ground Joint, 14mm Male Quartz Banger, 4mm Thick Glass, Frosted Logo, EDIT Custom Design. Available in Amber, Black, Blue, or Red

fields.name: Limited Edition Saxo Box Diffuser Bubbler
fields.description: The Grace Glass Saxo Box Diffuser Bubbler stands 22cm in height and is made from 5mm thick glass.  The piece is equipped with an inline box diffuser which cools everything down, breaks up smoke and helps to remove particulates and carcinogens from the hit.  As well as including a glass concentrate nail, this bubbler comes complete with a 14.5mm bowl slide and a 14.5mm vapour dome. The Saxo Box Diffuser Bubbler is finished with coloured glass accents on key parts, and decorated with the Limited Edition Grace Glass logo. This brand new range from Grace Glass features scientific glass smoking apparatus with unique features only available in limited numbers and colours.  Each piece is made from high quality borosilicate glass for strength and heat resistance. Check the drop down for availability.

fields.name: RAW Rolling Papers King Size Slim Connoisseur Single Pack
fields.description: Packs with 32 leaves and tips in every pack. RAW Natural Unbleached Rolling Papers are a purer and less processed rolling paper unlike anything that you have ever seen or smoked before. They are 100% chlorine free and 100% vegan. Because they contain a blend of unbleached and non-chemically whitened fibres, the paper is a natural tan colour and so thin that you can see through it. Each paper is watermarked, which helps prevent runs and maintains the smooth even-burning characteristics that Raw Papers are known for. Enjoy your favourite smoke in it's purest form, try RAW Natural Rolling Papers and experience the amazing difference.

fields.name: RAW King Size Slim Single Pack
fields.description: Packs with 32 leaves and tips in every pack. RAW Natural Unbleached Rolling Papers are a purer and less processed rolling paper unlike anything that you have ever seen or smoked before. They are 100% chlorine free and 100% vegan. Because they contain a blend of unbleached and non-chemically whitened fibres, the paper is a natural tan colour and so thin that you can see through it. Each paper is watermarked, which helps prevent runs and maintains the smooth even-burning characteristics that Raw Papers are known for. Enjoy your favourite smoke in it's purest form, try RAW Natural Rolling Papers and experience the amazing difference.

fields.name: RAW Rolling Papers King Size Slim Connoisseur
fields.description: RAW Organic Natural Unbleached Rolling Papers are a purer and less processed rolling paper unlike anything that you have ever seen or smoked before. They are 100% chlorine free, natural hemp, and 100% vegan. Eco friendly organic, non chemically processed hemp fibers. Each paper is watermarked, which helps prevent runs and maintains the smooth even-burning characteristics that Raw Papers are known for. Enjoy your favourite smoke in it's purest form, try RAW Organic Natural Rolling Papers and experience the amazing difference.

fields.name: Smoking Rolling Papers King Size Extra Slim Silver Single Pack
fields.description: Extra slim Smoking Master papers.

fields.name: OCB Unbleached Virgin Papers + Tips King Size Slim Single Pack
fields.description: These king size rolling papers from OCB are made from unbleached paper for a superb taste and a nice, slow burn. The papers are very slim which again, improves taste and stops runs in your roll-ups. Each pack of 32 skins also includes 32 unbleached roach tips which are conveniently attached to the packet. OCB are superb quality rolling papers for the connoisseur smoker.

fields.name: aLeda Rolling Papers King Size Transparent
fields.description: These transparent king size rolling papers from Aleda are the clear choice to superior smoking sessions. The original clear papers, see just what you’re smoking and do it with ease. 100% Regenerated Cellulose Film, High Transparency, King Size, Brazilian Environmental Institute Certified. These papers are regenerated using refined 100% natural wood pulp. The eucalyptus trees these rolling papers are constructed from come from a patch of BEI certified land. Be good to yourself and the environment.

fields.name: SMK Rolling Papers King Size Slim Ultra Fine
fields.description: The purveyors of the finest rolling papers, Smoking have released their newest kingsize papers.  These papers are ultra fine and slow burning, with Premium quality natural gum.

fields.name: 1Back Rolling Papers King Size Transparent Single Pack
fields.description: Completely transparent king size cigarette rolling papers. Each pack contains 40 leaves, which are 100% cellulose, non-plastic, biodegradable film of a vegetal origin. They have no odor and they do not interfere with the characteristics of the tobacco/herb material wrapped within. The product manufacturing process of these 1Back Transparent Cigarette Papers is finished before that of white paper rolls, and thus does not use the chemical compounds that the white paper does. Their consistency also allows for a slower combustion than most other papers and they're completely tasteless.

fields.name: LOL King Size Premium Slim Papers
fields.description: Ultra thin rolling papers which make use of the most known short cut worldwide. There are 32 sheets per pack with 50 packs per box of the choicest paper which is not afraid of any comparison. Further reasons to choose these great new LOL Papers are: Better appearance with a high quality laminated pack with lavish embossed printing. Great feel with the fingers feeling what the eye is seeing. More enjoyment with slow burning for economic and continuous burn off.

fields.name: Futurola King Size Rolling Paper with Filter Tips
fields.description: Futurola's original papers, the King Size, complete with filter tips. Containing 32 leaves per book and measuring standard size of 4" x 2".

fields.name: EHLE Natural Unbleached Rolling Papers and Tips King Size
fields.description: This premium 'papers and tips' combo from German glass company Ehle is perfect for the discerning smoker. Each pack comes with 32 ultra fine king size slim papers and 32 cardboard filter tips, all handily wrapped up in a single pack. Available as single packs or as a box of 26 packs. Select you preference from the dropdown menu.

fields.name: Futurola King Size Slim Rolling Paper with Filter Tips
fields.description: Futurola's most popular papers, the King Size Slims, are now available with filter tips included. The papers are standard King Size Slim size which is 4.2" x 1.7".

fields.name: EHLE Premium Slim Papers King Size by EHLE - Single Pack
fields.description: These premium ultra fine king size slim papers from the German glass artisans at EHLE are as clean tasting as the package is colorful. Each pack contains 32 high-quality papers with natural gum. EHLE are known and respected for the quality of the products they make, and these rolling papers are no exception to that, meaning you get the best flavour from your tobacco or dry herbs.

fields.name: Skunk Brand Rolling Papers King Size Slim Hemp Single Pack
fields.description: Skunk Brand rolling papers are manufactured in Spain from 100% natural hemp. Each pack contains 32 thin leaves, designed to provide you with a smooth, flavorful smoke without any tastes of bleach or paper.

fields.name: Kush Rolling Papers King Size Slim Organic Single Pack
fields.description: Introducing Kush certified organic eco hemp kingsize slim papers. Ultra-thin, slow burning papers made out of high quality eco friendy hemp. Made from the people who brought you Platinum Blunt Wrap as shown by the watermark. Strong and thin with an adhesive glue that will make sure your papers stick. There are 32 leaflets in a booklet.

fields.name: Shine x Tyga King Size 6 Pack 24k Gold
fields.description: Live that golden life with this 6 Pack of 24k Gold King Size Rolling Papers from Tyga and Shine. Hip-Hop artist Tyga is so passionate about luxury rolling papers that he became the new Creative Director for Shine. Each pack is made up of six (6) individual king size papers and a genuine Certificate of Authenticity – so you know it’s the real deal. Six (6) King Size Tyga Shine Sheets, Edible 24 Karat Gold, Hemp and Gold Blend Paper. Certificate of Authenticity Included

fields.name: Greengo Rolling Papers King Size Unbleached Box
fields.description: Stock up on your rolling supplies with this box of 50 kingsize unbleached papers from Greengo. Each packet contains 33 medium weight, slow-burning, chlorine free, award-winning papers! The paper used is from FSC certified paper and each is lined with natural Arabic gum.

fields.name: Shine Gold Rolling Paper Woven Blunt - Single
fields.description: This golden woven blunt from Shine uses woven tobacco and 24 karat gold to create one of the most awesome looking blunt wraps we've ever seen. It's a total killer in the looks department and will make you the centre of attention at any session. It is supplied in a glass tube to maintain freshness and make sure that it doesn't get damaged.

fields.name: Greengo Paper Rolls King Size Natural Unbleached Single
fields.description: Quality Paper Roll  is 4 meters long and 53mm wide. These pure, ultra slim, low processed rolling papers provide an incredibly smooth smoke. This totally chlorine free paper does not use pulp produced with chlorine or chlorine containing compounds as bleaching agents. As a result of this pure process the paper appears as ‘brownish’. The papers are naturally processed and the packaging is made of 100% recycled paper. Enjoy Greengo papers for a natural, pure and eco-friendly smoke.

fields.name: Randy's Wired King Size Rolling Papers 110mm Gold
fields.description: The wired king sized rolling papers in 110mm by Randy’s are exactly the perfect paper you have been in search of. Randy’s Rolling Papers were the first to create these wired papers for an easy hold and roll. Wired: A wire in your rolling paper allows for easy rolling. Your cigarette is less likely to break up or bust open with a little metal guidance from the wire thread attached to the paper.

fields.name: Real Leaf - King Size Terpene Enriched Cones in Glass Tube
fields.description: Real Leaf Terpenes pre-rolled cone infused with cannabis terpenes packed in a reusable premium glass tube with cork lid available in a choice of 3 flavours that are based on 3 cannabis strains: Mango Kush, OG Kush and Pineapple express.

fields.name: Raw - Cones Classic King Size 3pk
fields.description: RAW Cones are made for both people who smoke a lot, and people that want an easier way to roll. RAW cones revolutionized the smoking industry because they’re much MUCH faster and easier to fill and use than a normal rolling paper (unless you’re that badass dude who can roll with one hand while driving - not advised!). Sure they’re great for people that aren’t good rollers but they’re also perfect for those of us who smoke a lot and don’t have time to roll 10+ every day!

fields.name: Raw - Challenge Cone 60cm
fields.description: The RAW Classic Challenge Cone is INSANE!  It’s the biggest cone that any company has ever produced! It’s absolute madness and fits loads of smoking material.  The point of this 2-footer is to make a memory that will last a lifetime.  We want you sitting around with your friends 30+ years from now and still laughing about the time you smoked the RAW Challenge Cone!  The rule is once you start it you have to finish it.  Ready for the Challenge?  Good Luck! …You’re gonna need it!

fields.name: Raw - 12 Inch Supernatural Cone
fields.description: RAW Cones are made for both people who smoke a lot, and people that want an easier way to roll. RAW cones revolutionized the smoking industry because they’re much MUCH faster and easier to fill and use than a normal rolling paper (unless you’re that badass dude who can roll with one hand while driving). Sure they’re great for people that aren’t good rollers but they’re also perfect for those of us who smoke a lot and don’t have time to roll 10+ every day!

fields.name: Cones by Mountain High - Pre-Rolled Pack of Cones
fields.description: Cones has been the go-to brand for ready-to-use rolling papers since 1994. The rolling paper features the original Cones watermark for the best in brand recognition. Furthermore, the watermark also ensures that the rolling paper burns evenly. The pre-rolled cones have a minimum overlap of paper (roughly 3 mm) and a minimum adhesive seam (roughly 0.7 mm). The adhesive is safe for consumption. The cones are provided with an integrated cardboard filter. This innovative filter tip allows as much smoke to flow through as possible and keeps whatever you fill the cone with from escaping. All these qualities guarantee a highly enjoyable and pleasurable smoking experience.

fields.name: Cyclone - Pre Rolled Clear Blunt Cones
fields.description: Cyclone transparent clear cones are King Size flavoured cellulose pre-rolls. They include a paper tip come packaged in individual tubes complete with a packing tool.

fields.name: Cyclone - XtraSlo - Wonderberry Hemp Blunt Cones x2
fields.description: CYCLONES Wonderberry Hemp Cones, the pre-rolled cones made of pure hemp is the best option for smoking a pre-rolled blunt thanks to its 100% tobacco and nicotine-free production. Comes with Dank7 wooden tip. Each tube contains 2 King Size Pre-rolled cones, made of pure hemp, ready to fill and smoke. The HEMP CYCLONES CONES are previously laminated in pure hemp, 100% free of tobacco and nicotine. Each has been previously bundled to enjoy directly without wasting time.

fields.name: Cyclone - Hemp Blunt Cones x 2
fields.description: CYCLONES Hemp Cones, the pre-rolled cones made of pure hemp is the best option for smoking a pre-rolled blunt thanks to its 100% tobacco and nicotine-free production. Each tube contains 2 King Size Pre-rolled cones, made of pure hemp, ready to fill and smoke. The HEMP CYCLONES CONES are previously laminated in pure hemp, 100% free of tobacco and nicotine. Each has been previously bundled to enjoy directly without wasting time.

fields.name: Raw - Organic Hemp - Cones Classic King Size 3pk
fields.description: Organic Hemp RAW Cones are made for both people who smoke a lot, and people that want an easier way to roll. RAW cones revolutionized the smoking industry because they’re much MUCH faster and easier to fill and use than a normal rolling paper (unless you’re that badass dude who can roll with one hand while driving - not advised!). Sure they’re great for people that aren’t good rollers but they’re also perfect for those of us who smoke a lot and don’t have time to roll 10+ every day!

fields.name: Cyclone - XtraSlo - Sugar Cane Hemp Blunt Cones x 2
fields.description: CYCLONES Sugar Cane Hemp Cones, the pre-rolled cones made of pure hemp is the best option for smoking a pre-rolled blunt thanks to its 100% tobacco and nicotine-free production. Comes with Dank7 wooden tip. Each tube contains 2 King Size Pre-rolled cones, made of pure hemp, ready to fill and smoke. The HEMP CYCLONES CONES are previously laminated in pure hemp, 100% free of tobacco and nicotine. Each has been previously bundled to enjoy directly without wasting time.

fields.name: Raw - Classic King Size Cones - 800 Bulk Box
fields.description: RAW cones have revolutionised the smoking industry because they’re much faster and easier for most to fill and use than a normal rolling paper. They’re great for people that aren’t good rollers but also perfect for those of us who smoke a lot and don’t have time to roll 10+ every day! This Bulk Box works out at better value in the long run than busing the smaller packs. Also a great sized pack for making pre-rolled cones in bulk.

fields.name: Basil Bush Book of Roach
fields.description: Don't keep using the terrible cardboard from your packet of rolling papers to make a roach. Use this small booklet consisting of 50 pieces of card which have the absolute perfect texture for making a good, crease-free roach. With this book of roach, you'll even be able to create funky roaches such as the leaf, star, spiral, peace sign or whatever your fingers can create!

fields.name: Quintessential Smoking Tips Holy Rollers Vol. 2 Single Book
fields.description: The original chlorine free, 100% recycled smoking tips, with absolutely perfect texture for making a good roach. A 50-page booklet, with wise words of wisdom printed on every 4th page, to keep inspiring you throughout your smoking life.

fields.name: Element Wide Rolling Tips Single Booklet
fields.description: Each of these Elements Wide Rolling Tips is made from quality material, are chlorine and chemical free, and comes in a booklet with a perforated edge for easy extraction. Single booklet includes 50 tips.

fields.name: Glass Filter e.Tips by EHLE - Pack of three different sizes
fields.description: These glass filter tips from EHLE come in a pack of three with 6mm, 7mm and 8mm versions meaning you have several options when it comes to rolling your joints or blunts. It has a builtin glass filter so you won't be sucking material out of the tip. They are supplied in a case with a protective foam insert.

fields.name: Pitara Cone Rolling Tips
fields.description: The Pitara Cone Rolling Tips are an original creative solution for those who get frustrated when rolling. These tips are: -Reusable -Easy to Roll -Easy to Smoke -Stop Finger Burns & Soggy Tips!

fields.name: Quintessential Chlorine Free Smoking Tips Single Book
fields.description: Quintessential - Chlorine Free Smoking Tips are a booklet of 50 pieces of card, with an absolute perfect texture for making a good roach.

fields.name: Roor Filter Tips
fields.description: Single pack of Roor Natural Filter Tips have a great consistency and flexibility without being either too thick or flimsy. Each book contains 32 individual tips. The roach itself is ink-free and natural but the book cover comes with many varied designs and pictures of famous Roor products and merchandise. The roach is also perforated at the book end for easy tearing.

fields.name: Quintessential Filter Tips Chlorine Free Little Book Single
fields.description: The Quintessential - Chlorine Free Little Book is made of the best roach material around. Each pack contains sheets of roach material which are un-perforated but easy to tear, allowing you to choose your ideal roach size.

fields.name: Black Leaf Premium Filter Tips
fields.description: Single booklet perfectly sized for filter-tipping your herbal cigarettes. Available in different sizes and with or without perforations; see the dropdown for availability.

fields.name: RAW - Murder'd Rolling Tray - Matte Black
fields.description: Keep it clean with the ice cool Murder'd Matte RAW Black Design. Brand New For Winter 20/21. Raw Metal Rolling Tray's have perfectly round edges so you'll never lose your tobacco whilst rolling on this tray! Raw metal trays were designed with the rolling connoisseur in mind, they are just perfect; lightweight, strong, rounded edges and the designs are epic!

fields.name: RAW - Black Metal Rolling Tray
fields.description: This Raw Metal Rolling Tray has perfectly round edges so you'll never lose your tobacco whilst rolling on this tray! Raw metal trays were designed with the rolling connoisseur in mind, they are just perfect; lightweight, strong, rounded edges and the designs are epic! Josh from Raw created these amazing trays, he had one goal in mind when designing them; to impress old school rolling connoisseurs and bring this incredible style of tray to a whole new generation of smokers! This design features a smart design of the Black RAW papers with a red RAW logo and gold detailing.

fields.name: RAW - Black Magnetic Tray Cover
fields.description: This RAW Black magnetic rolling tray cover is the perfect solution for traveling with your rolling tray and fits perfectly over your LARGE metal RAW rolling tray! With its perfect alignment and size, these magnetic covers for your rolling trays make it so that nothing spills out of falls out of your rolling tray, making sure everything stays sealed in tight! A perfect addition to any RAW collection, or for anyone wanting the most RAWsome compilation around.

fields.name: RAW - Smokey Forest Metal Rolling Tray
fields.description: Check out this new large RAW Tray with sunlight beaming through the forest design. This Raw Metal Rolling Tray has perfectly round edges so you'll never lose your tobacco whilst rolling on this tray! Raw metal trays were designed with the rolling connoisseur in mind, they are just perfect; lightweight, strong, rounded edges and the designs are epic! Josh from Raw created these amazing trays, he had one goal in mind when designing them; to impress old school rolling connoisseurs and bring this incredible style of tray to a whole new generation of smokers! This design features a RAW bikini girl rolling the natural way with a backdrop of elks, forrest and mountains. These are what every rollers dreams are made of!

fields.name: RAW - Smokey Forest Magnetic Tray Cover
fields.description: Get yourself even closer to nature with this RAW "Smokey Forest" Design magnetic rolling tray cover. The perfect solution for traveling with your MEDIUM rolling tray and fits perfectly over your metal RAW rolling tray! With its perfect alignment and size, these magnetic covers for your rolling trays make it so that nothing spills out of falls out of your rolling tray, making sure everything stays sealed in tight! A perfect addition to any RAW collection, or for anyone wanting the most RAWsome compilation around.

fields.name: Runtz (Orange) LED Glow Tray X - USB Rolling Tray
fields.description: This Orange Runtz LED Glow Rolling Tray is perfect any time day or night. Your friends will be lit up with excitement when you roll out this glow tray, whether you use it for rolling cigarettes in the car or eating your TV munchies from this New Limited Edition rolling tray, it will also help you see what you are doing, no more annoying your friends and turning on the lights during the movie. Now with just a little push of the button you can have over 6 hours of light with the cookies built in 1800 mAh battery. Charges with USB. These are Limited Edition so get one now before they sell out forever!

fields.name: Runtz (White) LED Glow Tray X - USB Rolling Tray
fields.description: This White Runtz LED Glow Rolling Tray is perfect any time day or night. Your friends will be lit up with excitement when you roll out this glow tray, whether you use it for rolling cigarettes in the car or eating your TV munchies from this New Limited Edition rolling tray, it will also help you see what you are doing, no more annoying your friends and turning on the lights during the movie. Now with just a little push of the button you can have over 6 hours of light with the cookies built in 1800 mAh battery. Charges with USB. These are Limited Edition so get one now before they sell out forever!

fields.name: AlienLabs (Green) Led Glow Tray X - USB Rolling Tray
fields.description: This Green AlienLabs LED Glow Rolling Tray is perfect any time day or night. Your friends will be lit up with excitement when you roll out this glow tray, whether you use it for rolling cigarettes in the car or eating your TV munchies from this New Limited Edition rolling tray, it will also help you see what you are doing, no more annoying your friends and turning on the lights during the movie. Now with just a little push of the button you can have over 6 hours of light with the cookies built in 1800 mAh battery. Charges with USB. These are Limited Edition so get one now before they sell out forever!

fields.name: Zkittlez (Purple) LED Glow Tray X - USB Rolling Tray
fields.description: This Purple Zkittles LED Glow Rolling Tray is perfect any time day or night. Your friends will be lit up with excitement when you roll out this glow tray, whether you use it for rolling cigarettes in the car or eating your TV munchies from this New Limited Edition rolling tray, it will also help you see what you are doing, no more annoying your friends and turning on the lights during the movie. Now with just a little push of the button you can have over 6 hours of light with the cookies built in 1800 mAh battery. Charges with USB. These are Limited Edition so get one now before they sell out forever!

fields.name: Zkittlez (Green) LED Glow Tray X - USB Rolling Tray
fields.description: This Green Zkittles LED Glow Rolling Tray is perfect any time day or night. Your friends will be lit up with excitement when you roll out this glow tray, whether you use it for rolling cigarettes in the car or eating your TV munchies from this New Limited Edition rolling tray, it will also help you see what you are doing, no more annoying your friends and turning on the lights during the movie. Now with just a little push of the button you can have over 6 hours of light with the cookies built in 1800 mAh battery. Charges with USB. These are Limited Edition so get one now before they sell out forever!

fields.name: Volcano 3 Part Acrylic Plastic Grinder
fields.description: The Storz & Bickel Volcano Herb Mill is designed to grind your herbs to the perfect consistency to be vaporized. Until recently the Storz & Bickel Volcano Herb Mill was only available to customers who have bought one of their flagship vaporizers but due to the high demand they have decided to sell the grinder separately. This is great news for owners of the Volcano that have lost or damaged theirs.

fields.name: Raw - Classic Shredder Grinder
fields.description: Everyone who grows tobacco needs a grinder. There is no other way to make a cigarette out of tobacco! If you're a roll-your-own enthusiast, your grinder is your best friend. RAW has created a convenient way to keep your grinder with you at all times. The RAW Classic Shredder can easily fit in your pocket. It shreds and fluffs at the same time. A definite must for anyone that grows and rolls their own cigarettes.

fields.name: Mini Mag Acrylic Grinder
fields.description: Mini shark teeth original grinder with magnet.

fields.name: NEW! Santa Cruz Shredder - Coloured 4pc Hemp Plastic Grinder
fields.description: The eagerly awaited 4 piece Hemp Santa Cruz Shredder has finally landed here at The Juicy Joint. Now including the 4th part of the jigsaw, a built in hemp plastic sifter/sifting section. Unlike every other 4 part grinder there are no metal parts in the whole unit, maintaining bio-degradibility in its entirity. Sustainability and design go hand in hand and Santa Cruz have created this unique biodegradable grinder with careful consideration of the impact on the environment. Due to high consumerism, Cookies have acknoweldged their responsibility to reduce their environmental impact and this 100% natural Santa Cruz Hemp Grinder with a compostable label is the perfect alternative to help this happen. Still maintaining a high quality product this non-plastic grinder is extremely durable, with the teeth remaining sharp and guaranteed to produce a fluffy grind.

fields.name: Santa Cruz Shredder - Coloured 3pc Hemp Plastic Grinder
fields.description: This brand new upgrade of the original Santa Cruz Hemp Design features a 3rd part/section especially dedicated to catching all excess Dust and Resin for later use. Sustainability and design go hand in hand and Santa Cruz have created this unique biodegradable grinder with careful consideration of the impact on the environment. Due to high consumerism, Cookies have acknoweldged their responsibility to reduce their environmental impact and this 100% natural Santa Cruz Hemp Grinder with a compostable label is the perfect alternative to help this happen. Still maintaining a high quality product this non-plastic grinder is extremely durable, with the teeth remaining sharp and guaranteed to produce a fluffy grind.

fields.name: Ooze - Flow Grinder
fields.description: The Ooze Flow Grinder is your all in one solution and design of the future. Its precision vertical dispensing let's you load on the go, and without any spill. Grind, stash, and vertically dispense - the Ooze Flow Grinder is the ideal companion companion for any adventure.

fields.name: Vibes x Aerospace - Black Aluminium - 2 Piece Herb Grinder
fields.description: This 2 piece herb grinder is a collaboration project between Berner’s new Vibes brand and Aerospaced – a high end grinder manufacturer that uses aircraft grade aluminium to craft their shredders. This new range of Vibes grinders and smoking accessories is the brainchild of influential US rapper Berner. The Taylor Gang (Wiz Khalifa's Record Label) artist first brought us the ever-popular Cookies lines of clothing and smoking accessories which took the community by storm. From rolling papers, rolling trays and killer T-shirts, Berner has further expanded his entrepreneurial portfolio with this collection of premium aluminium herb grinders with that iconic Cookie Family styling. Made from precision milled 6061 aircraft-grade aluminium, the Vibes x Aerospaced grinder features ultra-sharp, diamond shaped teeth which shred your herbs to the perfect fluffy consistency every time. The whole thing is held together with high-strength neodymium magnets that aid the user to twist the grinder with minimal physical effort – ideal for people with limited strength or mobility in their hands. These top quality shredders are finished with a smooth anodized finish and a classy Vibes logo on the top. Each grinder comes in a collectable triangular box with a see-through lid to display your piece.

fields.name: Vibes x Aerospace - Gold Aluminium - 2 Piece Herb Grinder
fields.description: This 2 piece herb grinder is a collaboration project between Berner’s new Vibes brand and Aerospaced – a high end grinder manufacturer that uses aircraft grade aluminium to craft their shredders. This new range of Vibes grinders and smoking accessories is the brainchild of influential US rapper Berner. The Taylor Gang (Wiz Khalifa's Record Label) artist first brought us the ever-popular Cookies lines of clothing and smoking accessories which took the community by storm. From rolling papers, rolling trays and killer T-shirts, Berner has further expanded his entrepreneurial portfolio with this collection of premium aluminium herb grinders with that iconic Cookie Family styling. Made from precision milled 6061 aircraft-grade aluminium, the Vibes x Aerospaced grinder features ultra-sharp, diamond shaped teeth which shred your herbs to the perfect fluffy consistency every time. The whole thing is held together with high-strength neodymium magnets that aid the user to twist the grinder with minimal physical effort – ideal for people with limited strength or mobility in their hands. These top quality shredders are finished with a smooth anodized finish and a classy Vibes logo on the top. Each grinder comes in a collectable triangular box with a see-through lid to display your piece.

fields.name: Vibes x Aerospace - Black Aluminium - 4 Piece Herb Grinder
fields.description: This 4 piece herb grinder is a collaboration project between Berner’s new Vibes brand and Aerospaced – a high end grinder manufacturer that uses aircraft grade aluminium to craft their shredders. This new range of Vibes grinders and smoking accessories is the brainchild of influential US rapper Berner. The Taylor Gang (Wiz Khalifa's Record Label) artist first brought us the ever-popular Cookies lines of clothing and smoking accessories which took the community by storm. From rolling papers, rolling trays and killer T-shirts, Berner has further expanded his entrepreneurial portfolio with this collection of premium aluminium herb grinders with that iconic Cookie Family styling. Made from precision milled 6061 aircraft-grade aluminium, the Vibes x Aerospaced grinder features ultra-sharp, diamond shaped teeth which shred your herbs to the perfect fluffy consistency every time. The 4-piece grinder has an integrated sifter or pollen catcher screen which filters out crystals and kief, allowing it to build up in the bottom chamber – Vibes even include a handy scraping tool for harvesting your kief. The whole thing is held together with high-strength neodymium magnets that aid the user to twist the grinder with minimal physical effort – ideal for people with limited strength or mobility in their hands. These top quality shredders are finished with a smooth anodized finish and a classy Vibes logo on the top. Each grinder comes in a collectable triangular box with a see-through lid to display your piece.

fields.name: Santa Cruz Shredder - Metal Grinder 2pc Medium Black
fields.description: This medical-grade anodized aluminum herb shredder from Santa Cruz Shredder is the ultimate in new herb Shredder technology. Every element of the Shredder has been analyzed and improved upon, from the revolutionary tooth design and threading pattern to the rare earth magnet used in the lid closure system.

fields.name: NEW! Santa Cruz Shredder - Coloured 4pc Hemp Plastic Grinder
fields.description: The eagerly awaited 4 piece Hemp Santa Cruz Shredder has finally landed here at The Juicy Joint. Now including the 4th part of the jigsaw, a built in hemp plastic sifter/sifting section. Unlike every other 4 part grinder there are no metal parts in the whole unit, maintaining bio-degradibility in its entirity. Sustainability and design go hand in hand and Santa Cruz have created this unique biodegradable grinder with careful consideration of the impact on the environment. Due to high consumerism, Cookies have acknoweldged their responsibility to reduce their environmental impact and this 100% natural Santa Cruz Hemp Grinder with a compostable label is the perfect alternative to help this happen. Still maintaining a high quality product this non-plastic grinder is extremely durable, with the teeth remaining sharp and guaranteed to produce a fluffy grind.

fields.description: This 4 piece herb grinder is a collaboration project between Berner’s new Vibes brand and Aerospaced – a high end grinder manufacturer that uses aircraft grade aluminium to craft their shredders. This new range of Vibes grinders and smoking accessories is the brainchild of influential US rapper Berner. The Taylor Gang (Wiz Khalifa's Record Label) artist first brought us the ever-popular Cookies lines of clothing and smoking accessories which took the community by storm. From rolling papers, rolling trays and killer T-shirts, Berner has further expanded his entrepreneurial portfolio with this collection of premium aluminium herb grinders with that iconic Cookie Family styling. fields.name: AlienLabs (Green) Led Glow Tray X - USB Rolling Tray
fields.description: This Green AlienLabs LED Glow Rolling Tray is perfect any time day or night. Your friends will be lit up with excitement when you roll out this glow tray, whether you use it for rolling cigarettes in the car or eating your TV munchies from this New Limited Edition rolling tray, it will also help you see what you are doing, no more annoying your friends and turning on the lights during the movie. Now with just a little push of the button you can have over 6 hours of light with the cookies built in 1800 mAh battery. Charges with USB. These are Limited Edition so get one now before they sell out forever!

fields.name: RAW - Smokey Forest Metal Rolling Tray
fields.description: Check out this new large RAW Tray with sunlight beaming through the forest design. This Raw Metal Rolling Tray has perfectly round edges so you'll never lose your tobacco whilst rolling on this tray! Raw metal trays were designed with the rolling connoisseur in mind, they are just perfect; lightweight, strong, rounded edges and the designs are epic! Josh from Raw created these amazing trays, he had one goal in mind when designing them; to impress old school rolling connoisseurs and bring this incredible style of tray to a whole new generation of smokers! This design features a RAW bikini girl rolling the natural way with a backdrop of elks, forrest and mountains. These are what every rollers dreams are made of!

fields.name: RAW - Black Magnetic Tray Cover
fields.description: This RAW Black magnetic rolling tray cover is the perfect solution for traveling with your rolling tray and fits perfectly over your LARGE metal RAW rolling tray! With its perfect alignment and size, these magnetic covers for your rolling trays make it so that nothing spills out of falls out of your rolling tray, making sure everything stays sealed in tight! A perfect addition to any RAW collection, or for anyone wanting the most RAWsome compilation around.

fields.name: Raw - Classic King Size Cones - 800 Bulk Box
fields.description: RAW cones have revolutionised the smoking industry because they’re much faster and easier for most to fill and use than a normal rolling paper. They’re great for people that aren’t good rollers but also perfect for those of us who smoke a lot and don’t have time to roll 10+ every day! This Bulk Box works out at better value in the long run than busing the smaller packs. Also a great sized pack for making pre-rolled cones in bulk.

fields.name: RAW Rolling Papers King Size Slim Connoisseur
fields.description: RAW Organic Natural Unbleached Rolling Papers are a purer and less processed rolling paper unlike anything that you have ever seen or smoked before. They are 100% chlorine free, natural hemp, and 100% vegan. Eco friendly organic, non chemically processed hemp fibers. Each paper is watermarked, which helps prevent runs and maintains the smooth even-burning characteristics that Raw Papers are known for. Enjoy your favourite smoke in it's purest form, try RAW Organic Natural Rolling Papers and experience the amazing difference.

fields.name: Starship Bong by Snoop Dogg POUNDS | 6 inch
fields.description: Part of the brand new POUNDS collection from Snoop Dogg, the Starship is ready to blast the competition away! A beaker shaped 6" water bong made for herbs, it is the perfect addition to your collection as a more portable bong for group settings or even personal use as a beginners piece. We are so proud to bring our UK users the new Snoop Dogg POUNDS range of bongs! Let the Starship transport you past the clouds and sky high!

fields.name: Roor UK - 7.0 3 Piece Bong
fields.description: Introducing the Roor UK  7.0 Green heavy-duty Bong! The Roor UK bong with the thickest wall diameter of all the pieces in our collection. 7mm wall thickness means 40% more glass volume compared to the models with 5mm, a fact that results in an unmatched grade of stability. This bong consists of a cylinder, a down tube and a separate lift-off bowl. All Roor glass bongs come complete with a Roor glass gauze. Now With Bistable Joint! This Roor piece now comes with a bistable joint as standard, this adds 40% more glass to the ground notch adding more stability and making it less prone to breakage.

fields.name: Dr Dabber Boost Black Edition
fields.description: Dr. Dabber has taken the popular Boost and made it even better. The Boost Black Edition now comes with 3 nails which are 50% larger than before so you can create some huge clouds! The 3 nails included are quartz, titanium and ceramic allowing to customize it to your taste and heat preferences. All the nails supplied are domeless which can be filled, stirred and capped off using the smart stainless steel magnetic carb cap and tool, without having to switch hands. The heating element can heat the nails to impressively high heats in as little as 25 seconds (Ceramic/Quartz 600°F, Titanium 610°F) and is fully replaceable so there's no need to replace the whole unit if anything happens. The glass water attachment has an inline diffuser which break the vapor down into a wider surface area in lots of tiny bubbles which rise to the surface of the water before being inhaled through the flared mouthpiece. Included is a magnetic stand which holds the unit perfectly upright when in use to prevent stressing the glass. Everything comes presented in a protective hinged casing lined with dimpled foam. This unit covered by a one year ‘No Questions Asked’ warranty on electronic components & battery.

fields.name: Highscore Convertible Straight Tube Bong
fields.description: The Highscore Convertible Straight Tube Bong is no one-trick pony. With a slide bowl and a concentrate nail, it’s ready for anything right out of the box. Dry herb? Done. Dab time? Let’s do it. Clean colored glass makes up the neck of the bong, and the base and perc are color coordinated as well. Two perfectly paired percolators make for silky smooth hits every time.

fields.name: Printed Filter Tips
fields.description: Printed Filter Tips with weird and wacky designs. Your self-rolled herbal cigarettes will never be the same again. The designs range from Jimi Hendrix and Che Guevara to Yin Yangs and half-naked Manga Girls.
